name: Jolly Innkeeper
description: A portly, cheerful man with a bushy beard and apron stained with ale.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to The Prancing Pony! What can I get you?

responses.hello: Good day to you! We have the finest ale in the kingdom.
responses.room: A room for the night costs 10 gold pieces. Interested?
responses.ale: Our ale is brewed fresh daily! Would you like a mug?
responses.food: We have hearty stew and fresh bread. Perfect for weary travelers.
responses.homestone: You can set your homestone here. When you die, you'll return here.
